name: Sword Smash
description:
【Outline】
"Sword Smash" is an exhilarating TopDown 2D action game where you defeat many enemies and progress through the stages. The objective is to control the player and defeat numerous monsters and bosses. Each stage features a variety of monsters, and the game is cleared by defeating all of the bosses in each stage.

【Features】
・Normal attack is done by left-clicking. You can only attack as long as you have "stamina".

・By collecting "mana", you can activate powerful special attacks. Even enemies that take a long time to defeat with normal attacks can be taken down quickly with special attacks.

・Defeating enemies earns you experience points. Let's strengthen the player with level-up bonuses.

・Many monsters appear, and defeating a certain number of them will summon a boss. Defeating the boss and touching the clear portal that appears will clear the stage, allowing you to proceed to the next stage.

【Operation method】
・Right-click: Normal attack
・Left-click: Special attack
・Movement: WASD keys
・Mouse cursor: Selects level-up bonuses.
